content:
Welcome to the island where you rule.

Welcome to the island where you rule. Marholmen is like no other place in Sweden. At the same moment as you crossed the bridge, a new world opens. An independent island for those seeking relaxation, job satisfaction or wonderful experiences. Our hierarchy is reversed. We who lead the kingdom do it for one purpose - that you as a guest will feel like a king or queen. Our only team is that you will never want to leave us. But when you do, still carry us with you even after you get home.
